Headline: #62 Archer Temporary Reroute at Archer/Lock
ShortDescription: 62 Archer buses are temporarily rerouted via Archer, Ashland, Cermak, Halsted to Orange Line terminal due to, street blockage near Archer/Lock.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#62 Archer buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Archer, Ashland, Cermak, Halsted to Orange Line terminal due to, street blockage near Archer/Lock.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Green Line Delays
ShortDescription: Some Green Line trains are operating with residual delays after an earlier unauthorized person on the tracks at Pulaski. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Some Green Line trains are operating with residual delays after an earlier unauthorized person on the tracks at Pulaski.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
